hero.title: Get Discovered. Get Booked.
hero.subtitle: Put <bold>{{businessName}}</bold> in front of ready-to-book clients instantly. We’ve prepared your services for discovery—no ads, no hassle.

catalog.title: YOUR TERMS
catalog.description: Launch with confidence. You're in control of your growth.

preview.text: This is your marketplace control center. Once listed, you'll be able to manage your public profile, portfolio, and booking settings right from this page.

bookings.title: 24/7 Bookings
bookings.description: Stop chasing DMs. Clients view availability and book services while you sleep. No missed opportunities.

reach.title: Growth
reach.description: We put you on the map. Clients find and book your services instantly.

revenue.title: Fill Empty Slots Automatically
revenue.description_one: We handle the admin - confirmations and reminders are sent automatically so you never miss a payout. Fill empty slots at your {{count}} location.
revenue.description_other: We handle the admin - confirmations and reminders are sent automatically so you never miss a payout. Fill empty slots at your {{count}} locations.
